LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PoweredShortsword.label: Powered shortsword
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PoweredShortsword.descriptio: A highly-advanced short sword. Commonly used by Glitterworld assault troops, the blade is coated in a field of ionized plasma, helping it cut through enemy armor.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_WraithBlade.label: Wraith blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_WraithBlade.description: Highly advanced melee weapon. When active it emits a constant stream of ionized plasma that can cut through almost any armor. It's otherworldly appearance earned it the moniker and inspired many norbal folktales.
